Package com.kneelawk.graphlib

Class GraphLib

java.lang.Object
com.kneelawk.graphlib.GraphLib
public final class GraphLib extends Object
Graph Lib public API. This class contains static methods and fields for interacting with Graph Lib, obtaining a BlockGraphController, or registering BlockNodeDecoders and BlockNodeDiscoverers.

  • Method Details

    • registerDiscoverer

      public static void registerDiscoverer(@NotNull @NotNull BlockNodeDiscoverer discoverer)
      Registers a BlockNodeDiscoverer for use in detecting the nodes in a given block position.

      Nodes that are discovered here are usually created by the block or block-entity present at the given location. These nodes are then compared, using their hashCode() and equals() functions, to the nodes already in the controller's graphs at the given location and used to make adjustments if necessary.

      Parameters:
      discoverer - the discoverer used for detecting the nodes in a given block position.

    • getNodesInBlock

      @NotNull public static @NotNull Set<BlockNode> getNodesInBlock(@NotNull @NotNull ServerWorld world, @NotNull @NotNull BlockPos pos)
      Gets a set of all the BlockNodes a block should have.
      Parameters:
      world - the world to check in.
      pos - the position to check at.
      Returns:
      a set of all the BlockNodes that should be at that position.

    • getController

      @NotNull public static @NotNull BlockGraphController getController(@NotNull @NotNull ServerWorld world)

      Parameters:

      Returns:
      the BlockGraphController of the given world.
